name: How to build a Wizard Spaceship
name_original: How to build a Wizard Spaceship
description:
You are stranded on a lonely island. And what is the best way to get off of lonely islands? Spaceships! But how do you evade all the aliens up there? Get some wizards on board! So go build yourself a Wizard Spaceship!

This is a small city-building game, but without the ability to destroy buildings, very limited space, infinite money and stars the faster you build your spaceship.
